content.rendered:
Retreat Events

Sadhana Satsang ♦ Bhakit Yoga Tour & Kirtan Camp ♦ Akhand Kirtan

The following Special Sadhana Programs are included as retreat events, and will be held at Sadhana Shivir:

Sadhana Satsang

Coming soon…

Bhakit Yoga Tour & Kirtan Camp

A special attraction for everyone to go to Bhakti Yoga Tour & Kirtan Camp. The updated information about this Special Sadhana Program is as follows:

Upcoming Tour

Retreat Events Registration Form
